title: Intransigent Warhammer
content:
Intransigent Warhammer Uncommon 1~10 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8) Bludgeoning Impulse Blast: Knocks nearby creatures Prone after killing a target or making a Critical Hit. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The elegant design of this hammer belies its brutal, crushing power. This weapon does not give ground. WarhammerVersatile 2.7 100

Intransigent Warhammer

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d10 (1d8) Bludgeoning

Impulse Blast: Knocks nearby creatures Pro
